ai-iti71:1.1_0: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti71:2.1_0: “Mendicants, I’ve seen beings who engaged in good conduct of body, speech, and mind, who did not abuse the noble ones, who held right view and acted accordingly.
ai-iti71:2.2_0: at the breaking up of the body, after death, have been reborn in a good destination, a heaven world.
ai-iti71:3.1_0: Now, I don’t say this because I’ve heard it from some other ascetic or brahmin.
ai-iti71:3.2_0: Mendicants, I’ve seen beings who engaged in good conduct of body, speech, and mind, who did not abuse the noble ones, who held right view and acted accordingly.
ai-iti71:3.3_0: at the breaking up of the body, after death, have been reborn in a good destination, a heaven world.
ai-iti71:3.4_0: I only say it because I’ve known, seen, and realized it for myself.”
ai-iti71:4.1_0: Mendicants, I’ve seen beings who engaged in good conduct of body, speech, and mind, who did not abuse the noble ones, who held right view and acted accordingly.
ai-iti71:4.2_0: at the breaking up of the body after death, have been reborn in a good destination, a heaven world.”
ai-iti71:4.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-iti71:5.3_0: and right bodily deeds have been done,
ai-iti71:6.2_0: though their life may be short,
ai-iti71:6.3_0: when their body breaks up, that wise person
ai-iti71:7.1_0: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
